en.heroSubtitle: The B2B marketplace connecting clothing manufacturers with retailers efficiently and sustainably.
en.aboutText: We simplify the B2B clothing supply chain, connecting small & medium clothing workshops with retailers and companies who need bulk apparel.
en.productTshirtsDesc: High-quality, customizable t-shirts for bulk orders.
en.productHoodiesDesc: Comfortable and stylish hoodies for your brand.
en.productPantsDesc: Durable pants suitable for all types of bulk orders.
en.productShirtsDesc: Premium shirts for casual or formal bulk production.
en.productLeggingsDesc: Comfortable and stretchy leggings for activewear lines.
en.productJeansDesc: Classic denim jeans with premium finishing for bulk orders.
en.productLoungewearDesc: Soft and cozy loungewear sets for your brand.
en.productActivewearDesc: Trendy, performance-driven activewear for bulk production.
en.testimonial1: "StichFlow streamlined our bulk orders and helped us find reliable workshops in no time!"
en.testimonial2: "As a small manufacturer, I gained exposure to new clients easily through StichFlow."
en.testimonial3: "Fast, reliable, and cost-effective. A must for apparel businesses."
en.contactText: Contact us at sales@stichflow.com or request a demo.
en.heroSubtitle: Offer your own brand with our private label clothing solutions.
en.aboutTitle: Flowcart: A One-Stop Private Label Clothing Manufacturer
en.aboutDesc1: Flowcart helps you turn your apparel dreams into reality. From design to packaging, we provide full support every step of the way, enabling you to create your own private label clothing collection.
en.aboutDesc2: With decades of industry experience and a powerful team of highly experienced professionals, we can help you craft the perfect custom collection to meet your vision.
en.bangForBuckDesc: Our streamlined production processes and expertise in design, sourcing, and manufacturing ensure efficient, cost-effective production of each garment to deliver the best value.
en.qualityControlDesc: Alongside our team of experts, you have the opportunity to oversee the entire production process, ensuring that each piece that we produce will be of the highest quality and durability.
en.flexibilityDesc: In working with us to create your private label apparel, you have more flexibility to craft the exact pieces that you want, including clothing, sizes, colors, and fabrics.
en.sustainableDesc: Our factory is certified eco-friendly and follows strict labor laws to offer ethically responsible pieces of the highest quality.
en.fullPackagesDesc: Each garment that we produce includes everything you need, such as cut and sew samples, fittings, tech packs, and more.
en.rndDesc: Our in-house R&D team has experience in private label wholesale clothing, including professional patternmakers and dedicated researchers with a monthly development capacity of 100+ styles.
en.labelsTitle: Types of Labels You Can Customize
en.wovenLabelDesc: Durable labels for all types of clothing.
en.satinLabelDesc: Elegant labels for dresses, formal wear, etc.
en.printedLabelDesc: Versatile branded label for all clothing.
en.hangTagDesc: Customized branded tags for all clothing types.
en.plasticTagDesc: Customizable tags for clothing security and branding.
en.contactDesc: Contact us at sales@flowcart.com or request a demo.
en.faqQ2: What’s the difference between private label and white label?
en.faqQ3: Is private label apparel brand profitable?
en.faqQ4: Can I private label wholesale clothing?
en.faqA4: Yes. You can private label wholesale clothing. It allows you to establish your own brand identity and market the clothing items as your own.
en.faqQ5: Can I get discounted prices for wholesale private label clothing?
en.faqQ6: How can I receive a quote?
en.contactSectionDesc: Contact us today to discuss your bespoke apparel needs. You can email us at sales@flowcart.com or use the form here.
en.contactAddress: Address: Unit 144, Building 2, Longteng 18 E-commerce Industrial Park, No. 299 Jude Road, Haizhu District, Guangzhou, China 510000
en.hero_subtitle: Connecting clothing workshops with brands and retailers for efficient, sustainable, and quality-focused production.
en.mission_text: To streamline B2B apparel manufacturing by providing workshops and brands a reliable platform for bulk orders while promoting sustainable practices.
en.vision_text: To empower clothing workshops globally and enable brands to access high-quality, eco-friendly apparel production effortlessly.
en.story_text_1: Flowcart was founded in 2017 by a group of people with long experience in the fashion and clothing manufacturing industry. We had a vision to become the provider of reliable and efficient manufacturing services for clothing businesses worldwide.
en.story_text_2: Since then, we have become one of the leading Chinese clothing manufacturers serving companies of all sizes in 50+ countries. We have partnered with major brands like Dunhill, Metro, Tesco, ASOS, etc.
en.story_text_3: At Flowcart, we are proud of our history, and excited about the future as we continue to grow and expand our capabilities to meet the ever-changing needs of the fashion industry.
en.sustainability_text: Promoting eco-friendly manufacturing and ethical practices across all workshops.
en.quality_text: Ensuring high-quality standards and reliable production for every bulk order.
en.transparency_text: Providing full visibility and trust in supply chains and workshop collaborations.
en.cut_sew_text: Tailor-made apparel and accessories for your business.
en.private_label_text: Sell high-quality garments with your custom brand.
en.oem_text: Production based on your design and material requirements.
en.sustainability_section_text: Flowcart maintains sustainable and ethical practices in our operations. Products use organic, biodegradable, and recycled fabrics with fair labor practices.
en.contact_text: Discuss your bespoke apparel needs. Email sales@flowcart.com or use the contact form.
en.hero_subtitle: Premium activewear for fitness brands, bulk orders, and custom designs.
en.feature_1_text: Leggings, sports bras, tank tops, hoodies, and performance sets tailored for all fitness activities.
en.feature_2_text: Moisture-wicking, breathable, and durable fabrics ensure comfort during workouts and athletic activities.
en.feature_3_text: Offer logos, embroidery, and private label options for bulk orders and brand identity.
en.feature_4_text: Sustainable practices and eco-conscious materials are available for responsible brands.
en.hero_subtitle: Sustainable packaging options for all your clothing orders.
en.commitment_title: Our Commitment to Sustainable Clothing Packaging
en.commitment_desc: FlowCraft is a sustainably-focused business. We aim to make 100% of our packaging reusable, recyclable, or biodegradable.
en.types_title: Types of Eco-Friendly Packaging We Use
en.pla_desc: Bioplastic from renewable sources like corn starch.
en.cardboard_desc: Gives materials a second life and reduces waste.
en.embrace_desc: We enable our partners to stay true to eco-conscious values with reusable and recyclable packaging solutions.
en.responsible_title: We Operate Responsibly at Every Stage
en.responsible_desc: From design to packaging, FlowCraft uses eco-friendly materials, low-impact printing, and recycling practices at every step.

nl.heroSubtitle: De B2B-marktplaats die kledingfabrikanten efficiënt en duurzaam met retailers verbindt.
nl.aboutText: We vereenvoudigen de B2B-kledingketen en verbinden kleine & middelgrote werkplaatsen met retailers en bedrijven die in bulk kleding nodig hebben.
nl.productHoodiesDesc: Comfortabele en stijlvolle hoodies voor uw merk.
nl.productPantsDesc: Duurzame broeken geschikt voor alle soorten bulkbestellingen.
nl.productShirtsDesc: Premium overhemden voor casual of formele bulkproductie.
nl.productLeggingsDesc: Comfortabele en rekbare leggings voor activewear lijnen.
nl.productJeansDesc: Klassieke denim jeans met premium afwerking voor bulkbestellingen.
nl.productLoungewearDesc: Zachte en comfortabele loungewear sets voor uw merk.
nl.testimonial1: "StichFlow stroomlijnde onze bulkbestellingen en hielp ons snel betrouwbare workshops te vinden!"
nl.testimonial2: "Als kleine fabrikant kreeg ik gemakkelijk toegang tot nieuwe klanten via StichFlow."
nl.testimonial3: "Snel, betrouwbaar en kosteneffectief. Een must voor kledingbedrijven."
nl.contactText: Neem contact met ons op via sales@stichflow.com of vraag een demo aan.
nl.heroSubtitle: Bied uw eigen merk aan met onze private label kledingoplossingen.
nl.aboutTitle: Flowcart: Uw Complete Private Label Kledingfabrikant
nl.aboutDesc1: Flowcart helpt u uw kledingdromen te realiseren. Van ontwerp tot verpakking, wij bieden volledige ondersteuning bij elke stap, zodat u uw eigen private label kledingcollectie kunt creëren.
nl.aboutDesc2: Met tientallen jaren ervaring in de industrie en een krachtig team van zeer ervaren professionals, kunnen we u helpen de perfecte op maat gemaakte collectie te creëren die past bij uw visie.
nl.bangForBuckDesc: Onze gestroomlijnde productieprocessen en expertise in ontwerp, sourcing en productie zorgen voor efficiënte, kosteneffectieve productie van elk kledingstuk om de beste waarde te leveren.
nl.qualityControlDesc: Samen met ons team van experts kunt u het hele productieproces volgen, zodat elk stuk dat we produceren van de hoogste kwaliteit en duurzaamheid is.
nl.flexibilityDesc: Bij het creëren van uw private label kledinglijn met ons heeft u meer flexibiliteit om precies de kledingstukken te ontwerpen die u wilt, inclusief kleding, maten, kleuren en stoffen.
nl.sustainableDesc: Onze fabriek is gecertificeerd milieuvriendelijk en volgt strikte arbeidswetten om ethisch verantwoorde stukken van de hoogste kwaliteit te bieden.
nl.fullPackagesDesc: Elk kledingstuk dat we produceren bevat alles wat u nodig heeft, zoals cut & sew monsters, fittings, tech packs en meer.
nl.rndDesc: Ons interne R&D-team heeft ervaring met private label groothandelskleding, inclusief professionele patroonmakers en toegewijde onderzoekers met een maandelijkse ontwikkelingscapaciteit van 100+ stijlen.
nl.labelsTitle: Soorten labels die u kunt aanpassen
nl.wovenLabelDesc: Duurzame labels voor alle soorten kleding.
nl.satinLabelDesc: Elegante labels voor jurken, formele kleding, enz.
nl.hangTagDesc: Aangepaste merklabels voor alle soorten kleding.
nl.plasticTagDesc: Aanpasbare tags voor kledingbeveiliging en branding.
nl.contactDesc: Neem contact met ons op via sales@flowcart.com of vraag een demo aan.
nl.faqQ2: Wat is het verschil tussen private label en white label?
nl.faqQ4: Kan ik private label groothandelskleding krijgen?
nl.faqA4: Ja. U kunt private label groothandelskleding gebruiken. Hiermee kunt u uw eigen merkidentiteit opbouwen en de kledingstukken als uw eigen producten verkopen.
nl.faqQ5: Kan ik korting krijgen voor private label groothandelskleding?
nl.faqQ6: Hoe kan ik een offerte ontvangen?
nl.contactSectionDesc: Neem vandaag contact met ons op om uw op maat gemaakte kledingbehoeften te bespreken. U kunt mailen naar sales@flowcart.com of het formulier hier gebruiken.
nl.contactAddress: Adres: Unit 144, Building 2, Longteng 18 E-commerce Industrial Park, No. 299 Jude Road, Haizhu District, Guangzhou, China 510000
nl.hero_subtitle: Kledingwerkplaatsen verbinden met merken en retailers voor efficiënte, duurzame en kwaliteitsgerichte productie.
nl.mission_text: Het stroomlijnen van B2B kledingproductie door werkplaatsen en merken een betrouwbaar platform te bieden voor bulkbestellingen, terwijl duurzame praktijken worden bevorderd.
nl.vision_text: Werkplaatsen wereldwijd versterken en merken toegang geven tot hoogwaardige, milieuvriendelijke kledingproductie zonder moeite.
nl.story_text_1: Flowcart werd opgericht in 2017 door een groep mensen met ruime ervaring in de mode- en kledingproductie. We hadden de visie om betrouwbare en efficiënte productiediensten te bieden voor kledingbedrijven wereldwijd.
nl.story_text_2: Sindsdien zijn we een van de toonaangevende Chinese kledingfabrikanten geworden die bedrijven van alle groottes in 50+ landen bedienen. We hebben samengewerkt met grote merken zoals Dunhill, Metro, Tesco, ASOS, enz.
nl.story_text_3: Bij Flowcart zijn we trots op onze geschiedenis en enthousiast over de toekomst terwijl we blijven groeien en onze mogelijkheden uitbreiden om te voldoen aan de steeds veranderende behoeften van de mode-industrie.
nl.sustainability_text: Bevordering van milieuvriendelijke productie en ethische praktijken in alle werkplaatsen.
nl.quality_text: Zorg voor hoge kwaliteitsnormen en betrouwbare productie voor elke bulkbestelling.
nl.transparency_text: Volledige zichtbaarheid en vertrouwen in toeleveringsketens en samenwerking met werkplaatsen.
nl.cut_sew_text: Op maat gemaakte kleding en accessoires voor uw bedrijf.
nl.private_label_text: Verkoop hoogwaardige kleding met uw eigen merk.
nl.oem_text: Productie op basis van uw ontwerp- en materiaaleisen.
nl.sustainability_section_text: Flowcart hanteert duurzame en ethische praktijken in onze bedrijfsvoering. Producten gebruiken organische, biologisch afbreekbare en gerecyclede stoffen met eerlijke arbeidspraktijken.
nl.contact_text: Bespreek uw op maat gemaakte kledingbehoeften. E-mail sales@flowcart.com of gebruik het contactformulier.
nl.hero_subtitle: Premium sportkleding voor fitnessmerken, bulkbestellingen en maatwerk.
nl.feature_1_text: Leggings, sportbeha’s, tanktops, hoodies en performance sets voor alle fitnessactiviteiten.
nl.feature_2_text: Vochtregulerende, ademende en duurzame stoffen zorgen voor comfort tijdens trainingen.
nl.feature_3_text: Bied logo’s, borduurwerk en private label-opties voor bulkorders en merkidentiteit.
nl.feature_4_text: Duurzame praktijken en milieubewuste materialen beschikbaar voor verantwoordelijke merken.
nl.hero_subtitle: Duurzame verpakkingsopties voor al je kledingbestellingen.
nl.commitment_desc: FlowCraft is een duurzaam gericht bedrijf. Ons doel is om 100% van onze verpakking herbruikbaar, recyclebaar of biologisch afbreekbaar te maken.
nl.types_title: Soorten Milieuvriendelijke Verpakking die Wij Gebruiken
nl.pla_desc: Bioplastic gemaakt van hernieuwbare bronnen zoals maïszetmeel.
nl.cardboard_desc: Geeft materialen een tweede leven en vermindert afval.
nl.bio_plastics_desc: Plantaardige plastics die volledig biologisch afbreken.
nl.embrace_desc: Wij helpen onze partners trouw te blijven aan eco-vriendelijke waarden met herbruikbare en recyclebare verpakkingsoplossingen.
nl.responsible_title: Wij Werken Verantwoord op Elk Niveau
nl.responsible_desc: Van ontwerp tot verpakking, FlowCraft gebruikt milieuvriendelijke materialen en recyclingpraktijken in elke stap.

it.heroSubtitle: Il marketplace B2B che collega i produttori di abbigliamento con i rivenditori in modo efficiente e sostenibile.
it.aboutText: Semplifichiamo la catena di approvvigionamento B2B dell'abbigliamento, collegando laboratori di piccole e medie dimensioni con rivenditori e aziende che necessitano di abbigliamento all'ingrosso.
it.productTshirtsDesc: T-shirt personalizzabili e di alta qualità per ordini in blocco.
it.productHoodiesDesc: Felpe comode e alla moda per il tuo brand.
it.productPantsDesc: Pantaloni resistenti adatti a tutti i tipi di ordini in blocco.
it.productShirtsDesc: Camicie premium per produzione in blocco casual o formale.
it.productLeggingsDesc: Leggings comodi ed elastici per linee activewear.
it.productJeansDesc: Jeans classici in denim con finitura premium per ordini in blocco.
it.productLoungewearDesc: Set di loungewear morbidi e comodi per il tuo brand.
it.productActivewearDesc: Activewear alla moda e performante per produzione in blocco.
it.testimonial1: "StichFlow ha semplificato i nostri ordini in blocco e ci ha aiutato a trovare rapidamente workshop affidabili!"
it.testimonial2: "Come piccolo produttore, ho ottenuto facilmente esposizione a nuovi clienti tramite StichFlow."
it.testimonial3: "Veloce, affidabile ed economico. Un must per le aziende di abbigliamento."
it.contactText: Contattaci a sales@stichflow.com o richiedi una demo.
it.pageTitle: Produttore di Abbigliamento Private Label - Flowcart
it.heroSubtitle: Offri il tuo marchio con le nostre soluzioni di abbigliamento private label.
it.breadcrumb: Home > Produttore di Abbigliamento Private Label
it.aboutTitle: Flowcart: Produttore di Abbigliamento Private Label Tutto-in-Uno
it.aboutDesc1: Flowcart ti aiuta a trasformare i tuoi sogni di abbigliamento in realtà. Dal design al packaging, forniamo supporto completo in ogni fase, permettendoti di creare la tua collezione di abbigliamento private label.
it.aboutDesc2: Con decenni di esperienza nel settore e un team potente di professionisti altamente qualificati, possiamo aiutarti a creare la collezione su misura perfetta per realizzare la tua visione.
it.bangForBuckDesc: I nostri processi di produzione ottimizzati e l’esperienza in design, approvvigionamento e produzione garantiscono una produzione efficiente ed economica di ogni capo, offrendo il miglior valore.
it.qualityControlDesc: Insieme al nostro team di esperti, puoi supervisionare l’intero processo produttivo, assicurando che ogni capo prodotto sia della massima qualità e durata.
it.flexibilityDesc: Creando la tua linea di abbigliamento private label con noi, hai maggiore flessibilità per realizzare i capi esatti che desideri, inclusi abbigliamento, taglie, colori e tessuti.
it.sustainableDesc: La nostra fabbrica è certificata eco-friendly e segue rigide leggi sul lavoro per offrire capi eticamente responsabili della massima qualità.
it.fullPackagesDesc: Ogni capo che produciamo include tutto ciò di cui hai bisogno, come campioni cut & sew, fitting, tech pack e altro.
it.rndDesc: Il nostro team interno di R&S ha esperienza nell’abbigliamento private label all’ingrosso, inclusi modellisti professionisti e ricercatori dedicati con una capacità di sviluppo mensile di oltre 100 stili.
it.wovenLabelDesc: Etichette resistenti per tutti i tipi di abbigliamento.
it.satinLabelDesc: Etichette eleganti per abiti, abbigliamento formale, ecc.
it.printedLabelDesc: Etichette brandizzate versatili per tutti i capi.
it.heatPressLabelDesc: Etichette senza tempo per abbigliamento leggero.
it.hangTagDesc: Etichette brandizzate personalizzate per tutti i tipi di abbigliamento.
it.plasticTagDesc: Tag personalizzabili per sicurezza e branding dei capi.
it.contactDesc: Contattaci a sales@flowcart.com o richiedi una demo.
it.faqQ2: Qual è la differenza tra private label e white label?
it.faqQ3: Un marchio di abbigliamento private label è redditizio?
it.faqQ4: Posso fare private label abbigliamento all’ingrosso?
it.faqA4: Sì. Puoi fare private label abbigliamento all’ingrosso. Ti permette di stabilire la tua identità di marca e commercializzare i capi come tuoi.
it.faqQ5: Posso ottenere prezzi scontati per abbigliamento private label all’ingrosso?
it.contactSectionDesc: Contattaci oggi per discutere le tue esigenze di abbigliamento su misura. Puoi scrivere a sales@flowcart.com o usare il modulo qui.
it.contactAddress: Indirizzo: Unit 144, Building 2, Longteng 18 E-commerce Industrial Park, No. 299 Jude Road, Haizhu District, Guangzhou, China 510000
it.hero_subtitle: Collegare laboratori di abbigliamento con marchi e rivenditori per una produzione efficiente, sostenibile e orientata alla qualità.
it.mission_text: Snellire la produzione B2B di abbigliamento fornendo a laboratori e marchi una piattaforma affidabile per ordini in grandi quantità, promuovendo pratiche sostenibili.
it.vision_text: Potenziare i laboratori di abbigliamento a livello globale e consentire ai marchi di accedere facilmente a produzioni di abbigliamento ecologiche e di alta qualità.
it.story_text_1: Flowcart è stata fondata nel 2017 da un gruppo di persone con grande esperienza nel settore della moda e della produzione di abbigliamento. Avevamo la visione di diventare un fornitore affidabile ed efficiente di servizi di produzione per aziende di abbigliamento in tutto il mondo.
it.story_text_2: Da allora siamo diventati uno dei principali produttori di abbigliamento cinesi che servono aziende di tutte le dimensioni in oltre 50 paesi. Abbiamo collaborato con grandi marchi come Dunhill, Metro, Tesco, ASOS, ecc.
it.story_text_3: In Flowcart siamo orgogliosi della nostra storia e entusiasti del futuro mentre continuiamo a crescere e ampliare le nostre capacità per soddisfare le esigenze in continua evoluzione del settore della moda.
it.sustainability_text: Promuovere la produzione ecologica e pratiche etiche in tutti i laboratori.
it.quality_text: Garantire standard di alta qualità e una produzione affidabile per ogni ordine in grandi quantità.
it.transparency_text: Fornire piena visibilità e fiducia nelle catene di approvvigionamento e nelle collaborazioni con i laboratori.
it.cut_sew_text: Abbigliamento e accessori su misura per la tua azienda.
it.private_label_text: Vendere capi di alta qualità con il tuo marchio personalizzato.
it.oem_text: Produzione basata sul tuo design e sui requisiti dei materiali.
it.sustainability_section_title: Il Nostro Impegno per la Sostenibilità
it.sustainability_section_text: Flowcart mantiene pratiche sostenibili ed etiche nelle nostre operazioni. I prodotti utilizzano tessuti organici, biodegradabili e riciclati con pratiche di lavoro corrette.
it.contact_text: Discuti le tue esigenze di abbigliamento su misura. Invia un'email a sales@flowcart.com o usa il modulo di contatto.
it.hero_subtitle: Abbigliamento sportivo premium per marchi fitness, ordini all’ingrosso e design personalizzati.
it.feature_1_text: Leggings, reggiseni sportivi, canotte, felpe e set performance per tutte le attività fitness.
it.feature_2_text: Tessuti traspiranti, resistenti e ad asciugatura rapida garantiscono comfort durante gli allenamenti.
it.feature_3_text: Offriamo loghi, ricami e opzioni private label per ordini all’ingrosso e identità del marchio.
it.feature_4_text: Pratiche sostenibili e materiali eco-compatibili disponibili per marchi responsabili.
it.hero_subtitle: Opzioni di imballaggio sostenibili per tutti i tuoi ordini di abbigliamento.
it.commitment_title: Il Nostro Impegno per Imballaggi di Abbigliamento Sostenibili
it.commitment_desc: FlowCraft è un'azienda orientata alla sostenibilità. Puntiamo a rendere il 100% dei nostri imballaggi riutilizzabili, riciclabili o biodegradabili.
it.types_title: Tipi di Imballaggi Ecosostenibili che Utilizziamo
it.pla_desc: Bioplastica realizzata da fonti rinnovabili come l'amido di mais.
it.cellulose_desc: Derivata dalle piante, rinnovabile e compostabile.
it.cardboard_desc: Dà nuova vita ai materiali e riduce i rifiuti.
it.bubble_wrap_desc: Materiale protettivo compostabile per le spedizioni.
it.bio_plastics_desc: Plastiche vegetali progettate per biodegradarsi completamente.
it.embrace_desc: Aiutiamo i nostri partner a rimanere fedeli ai valori ecologici con imballaggi riutilizzabili e riciclabili.
it.responsible_title: Operiamo in Modo Responsabile ad Ogni Fase
it.responsible_desc: Dal design all’imballaggio, FlowCraft utilizza materiali ecologici e pratiche di riciclaggio in ogni fase.
